DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Collection Vial Biospecimen Filled Weight Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numeric value that indicates the weight of a biospecimen collection tube that contains a specimen.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Collection Vial Biospecimen Fill Weight
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The act or process of gathering biospecimens for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes._A small, often stoppered glass or plastic bottle for holding medicines and chemicals._Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._Execute or satisfy a request or order; supply or furnish._The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity.
